My message to you
I am proud of all that I and my Green colleagues have achieved while running the City Council. For example, last year Lancaster was named as the top district council for climate action by Climate Scorecards UK.
As a City Councillor and Planning Committee member I understand how Government and Council policies work, and what needs to change.
I am the Green Party’s national spokesperson for Culture, Sport and Digital Inclusion, leading policy development and media work in this area.
I’m ready for the challenge of working hard for you as your MP.
Please vote for me on Thursday 4 July.
